chapters.title: Chapter 26:  The Dedicated
chapters.info: Someshta, p. 428 (382)—A Nym who is present at the meeting of the Aes Sedai over the Dragon Banner and Callandor in Rand's seventh step through the columns of Rhuidean. The Nym are a race of people that grow things wherever they touch. Someshta is the last of the Nym, and the Aes Sedai asked him to watch over the Eye of the World for them until the Eye is used for its intended purpose (which was done when Rand drew on the pool of saidin and killed two Forsaken).
